page.title: 14SOVEREIGN CENTRE_ S. REIGATE
page.content: The block offers little in the way of recreation except the Sovereign Youth Center.This was founded in 1669 as a Youth Club Serving Woodhatch and South Park.It is a registered Charity. It now has permanent buildings between Sandcross Lane and Slipshatch Road.It offers Keep Fit for men and women,gym_ nastics,judo,trampolining,badminton, weight training,cycling,athletics,dan_ cing and discos.There are play groups for small children,a church group and groups for 5 to 7 year olds(Pied Piper Club),8 to 12 year olds(Junior Club) 12 to 17 year olds(Youth Club).Member _ship costs Â£1.00 for under 12's,Â£1.50 for over 12's students and Â£2.50 for workers.The facilities,which include a foodlit sports arena may be hired.A BMX track is under construction and alterations and extensions planned.The Youth Leader/ Warden is David Spurrel.
